# AIF and Financial Reports

### Investors

[ **Corporate Presentation** Download ](/_resources/presentations/corporate-presentation.pdf?v=0.052) [ **Asset Handbook** Download ](/_resources/handbooks/VOX-Asset-Handbook.pdf)

For a full list of Vox Royalty's regulatory filings, please visit [SEDAR](https://www.sedar.com/DisplayProfile.do?lang=EN&issuerType=03&issuerNo=00046012) or [EDGAR](https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1907909&owner=exclude).

Shareholders may request a hard copy of the Quarterly or Annual Financial Reports, free of charge, by emailing info@voxroyalty.com
